Headline: Yellow Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green and Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Adams/Wabash
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near the area of Roosevelt due to signal problems.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near the area of Roosevelt due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
